com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf
Class MultiCoreMultiBase

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf.MultiCoreMultiBase

public class MultiCoreMultiBase
extends java.lang.Object

To compute the product of modular exponentiations on a multi-core setting. The client builds a Vector and a set of worker threads then computes the individual exponentiations and accumulates the resulting product.

See Also:
Exponentiation
